features.sectionDesc: Comprehensive healthcare services designed for modern life, accessible anytime, anywhere.

item1.title: Video Consultations
item1.description: Connect with certified doctors through high-quality video calls, available 24/7.

item2.title: Smart Scheduling
item2.description: AI-powered appointment booking with calendar sync and automated reminders.

item3.title: Health Monitoring
item3.description: Track your vitals, symptoms, and medications with detailed insights.

item4.title: Digital Pharmacy
item4.description: Order prescriptions, set reminders, and track your medication history.

item5.title: Secure & Private
item5.description: HIPAA-compliant platform with end-to-end encryption and biometric security.

item6.title: Family Care
item6.description: Manage healthcare for your entire family with shared profiles and records.
